경작하다, 섬기다: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 240 240"><defs><linearGradient id="work-a" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#E8E5DC"/><stop offset="100%" stop-color="#D8D0C0"/></linearGradient><linearGradient id="work-b" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#C0B5A8" stop-opacity="0.5"/><stop offset="100%" stop-color="#B0A898" stop-opacity="0.3"/></linearGradient></defs><rect width="240" height="240" fill="url(#work-a)"/><ellipse cx="120" cy="180" rx="85" ry="22" fill="#C8BFB0" opacity="0.5"/><ellipse cx="120" cy="175" rx="75" ry="18" fill="#D0C5B5" opacity="0.4"/><path d="M 90 100 L 100 160 L 140 160 L 150 100 Z" fill="url(#work-b)"/><rect x="85" y="85" width="70" height="20" rx="10" fill="#C8BDB0" opacity="0.6"/><line x1="105" y1="120" x2="105" y2="160" stroke="#A89D90" stroke-width="1.5" opacity="0.5"/><line x1="120" y1="120" x2="120" y2="160" stroke="#A89D90" stroke-width="1.5" opacity="0.5"/><line x1="135" y1="120" x2="135" y2="160" stroke="#A89D90" stroke-width="1.5" opacity="0.5"/><path d="M 60 140 L 70 150 L 65 155" stroke="#B8ADA0" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.5"/><path d="M 180 140 L 170 150 L 175 155" stroke="#B8ADA0" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.5"/><circle cx="95" cy="145" r="5" fill="#D0C0B0" opacity="0.4"/><circle cx="145" cy="145" r="5" fill="#D0C0B0" opacity="0.4"/></svg>
땅을, 흙을: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 240 240"><defs><linearGradient id="ground-a" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="0%" y2="100%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#E5E0D5"/><stop offset="100%" stop-color="#D0C5B0"/></linearGradient><radialGradient id="ground-b"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#C8BFA8" stop-opacity="0.6"/><stop offset="100%" stop-color="#B8AF98" stop-opacity="0.3"/></radialGradient></defs><rect width="240" height="240" fill="url(#ground-a)"/><ellipse cx="120" cy="140" rx="90" ry="60" fill="url(#ground-b)"/><ellipse cx="120" cy="135" rx="75" ry="50" fill="#D0C5B0" opacity="0.5"/><ellipse cx="120" cy="130" rx="60" ry="40" fill="#D8CFBA" opacity="0.4"/><path d="M 40 160 Q 80 155, 120 160 T 200 160" stroke="#B8AF98" stroke-width="2.5" fill="none" opacity="0.5"/><path d="M 50 145 Q 90 140, 130 145 T 190 145" stroke="#C0B7A0" stroke-width="2" fill="none" opacity="0.4"/><circle cx="80" cy="125" r="8" fill="#C0B5A0" opacity="0.5"/><circle cx="160" cy="125" r="8" fill="#C0B5A0" opacity="0.5"/><circle cx="120" cy="115" r="9" fill="#C8BDA8" opacity="0.5"/><ellipse cx="95" cy="150" rx="12" ry="8" fill="#B0A890" opacity="0.4"/><ellipse cx="145" cy="150" rx="12" ry="8" fill="#B0A890" opacity="0.4"/><path d="M 60 180 Q 120 175, 180 180" stroke="#C8BDA8" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none" opacity="0.3"/></svg>
